message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  What do you think?
You didn't offer me enough in your first proposal. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve more than 20%.
Okay, let's try this again. I'm willing to compromise, but I need at least 45% of the money to make this worthwhile for me. What do you say?
You're being too greedy with your demands. I'm willing to give you a small share, but I think I deserve a majority of the money at this point.
I'm starting to think we're both being stubborn here.  I'm willing to go down to 30% to try and reach an agreement. Let's be reasonable and find a solution before we both lose even more money.
I'm not budging on the majority share. You're going to have to meet me at 5% if you want to make a deal.
